page.title: 17 Transport
page.content: Transport in the Maplesteads and Wickham St.Paul. Transport has changed considerably for those living in this rural area and now people are much more dependent on the motor car.Buses no longer run at all in Gt.Maplestead,although Wickham St.Paul still has four buses a week going to nearby towns. In order to overcome the problem of lack of transport particularly for the elderly,Eastern National buses run a Country Car.This seven seater car takes people between Halstead and Lt.Maplestead and Gt.Maplestead on a Tuesday and Friday.The cost of 70p single Â£1.05 return is however prohibitive to many old people.The Parish Council now is looking into ways of producing a volutary service to transport people to Halstead.
